name: Sandwiches
description:
https://giphy.com/gifs/H1Gm4csloGNol9Xz4G

You have 5 minutes to find minute (ie small) hero sandwiches. 

This  started as a pun and ended up being the kind of food dream you have when you've been dieting a lot.

I've been messing with Unity for a few years and decided I needed to publish something. This is my first game jam.
